channel.title: My range projectiles?
channel.description: Hello everyone, I just had a quick question, i've been stumped on my range projectiles for my battlescape source for like days now.. I usually don't request help.. But this really has me on my toes, i feel quite dumb.. But to get to the point, the range projectile while it's being shot, comes out of my feet.. After that, it's good, it shoots correctly.. It just come out of my feeet. If you could help, i'll give you some cookies? =]]] Thanks

item.title: My range projectiles?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

OoSilent:

Well, i just found out that the projectiles in battlescape are broken… overall lmao… soooo yeahh.

Nice, better get to work ;D

Read full topic

item.title: My range projectiles?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Sure, lemme just pull it out of my ass.

Look for

temp.createProjectile

Replace with temp.createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 90, arrowgfx, 43, 35, attacknpc + 1);

Make sure above that code you see something like if (UseBow

NOT DIRECTLY above it, just somewhere near it.

Any errors, please reply.

Read full topic

item.title: My range projectiles?
item.dc:creator: @OoSilent OoSilent
item.description:
@OoSilent wrote:

Hello everyone,
I just had a quick question, i’ve been stumped on my range projectiles for my battlescape source for like days now… I usually don’t request help… But this really has me on my toes, i feel quite dumb… But to get to the point, the range projectile while it’s being shot, comes out of my feet… After that, it’s good, it shoots correctly… It just come out of my feeet. If you could help, i’ll give you some cookies? =]]]
Thanks

Read full topic
